skills.label: mechanics
skills.description: Theoretical and practical applications of the science studying the action of displacements and forces on physical bodies to the development of machinery and mechanical devices.

aggregated_info: The Mechanics of Dance: Using Parametric Equations as Inspiration for Dance Choreography This video is the first of its kind to relate parametric equations, known as "Lissajous Figures," to dance. The goal of this project was to show that the fields of engineering and the arts are not mutually exclusive; in fact, one can very easily be used to inspire the other. The choreography for the final piece was produced using only data gathered from accelerometers attached to the dancers' bodies, resulting in a performance that premiered at The Kennedy Center in Washington, DC last May 2019 packaging engineering express yourself creatively gather data mechanics washington choreography inspire the arts fields of engineering the goal
title: The Mechanics of Dance: Using Parametric Equations as Inspiration for Dance Choreography
description: This video is the first of its kind to relate parametric equations, known as "Lissajous Figures," to dance. The goal of this project was to show that the fields of engineering and the arts are not mutually exclusive; in fact, one can very easily be used to inspire the other. The choreography for the final piece was produced using only data gathered from accelerometers attached to the dancers' bodies, resulting in a performance that premiered at The Kennedy Center in Washington, DC last May 2019
